DOC.brief_summary: Study determine effectiveness PresVIEW Scleral Implant improve near vision patient require reading glass .
DOC.brief_title: Trial PresView Implant Improvement Near Vision Patients With Presbyopia
DOC.criteria: Subject must 5060 year old Subject must best correct distance visual acuity 20/20 good Subject must mentally competent understand comply requirement study . Any previous eye surgery include cataract , LASIK , Muscle surgery Any chronic systemic disease diabetes , heart disease , Lupus , etc . Any eye diseases eye inflammation , infection , cataract , retinal disease
